## ????? Quick Start

### Option 1: Simple HTTP Server (Python)
```bash
python -m http.server 8000
```
Then visit: http://localhost:8000

### Option 2: Using npm serve
```bash
npm install
npm run serve
```

### Option 3: Live Server (with auto-reload)
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```
